title: Funziez! Men's LED Light Up Duck Feet Animal Slippers
features: LIGHT UP THE NIGHT - Each slipper features a hidden battery pack in a zip pocket that powers some fun LED Lights! Glow through your eve and bring extra fun to sleepovers.

BE A DUCK - The slippers sport a fluffy shaped outer and the cute webbed design of duck feet! Channel your inner quacking pond swimmer when you lounge in comfort or run out quick to get the mail. Keep your feet cozy and your heart warm in these adorable accessories.
GRIPPED SOLES - Traction dots throughout the sole ensure your slippers stay right where you want them.
COMFORT FOAM FOOTBED - For all the ultimate loungers out there, an ultra cushioned foam footbed surrounds your feet, keeping them supported and comfortable.

SIZING & CARE INSTRUCTIONS - FUNZIEZ! Slippers by Silver Lilly offers a variety of Women's and Men's Unisex Slipper Sizing. See the size chart in photo images for more details. Spot or wipe clean only.
description: Waddle around the house with these comfy LED Duck Feet Slippers from Funziez. Featuring the fluffy webbed design of duck feet, these home slippers will keep your feet cozy as you lounge around the house. Did we mention it lights up? A battery pack with an on-and-off switch is hidden in a zip pocket and powers a fun light-up feature in the front. The cushioned footbed provides extra support and the gripped outsole allows for traction to prevent slipping on hard floors. Ideal for all ages, any occasion and duck lovers of all kinds. We offer a variety of sizing for Men and Women. Please see the size chart for details.
